website_summaries.verdict: A quiet unit with a rotating nozzle, optional night light, and convenient handle on the 3 liter tank.
pros: The mist level can be adjusted, and the nozzle rotates 360 degrees for precise aim
The tank handle facilitates carrying to the sink for refills
The nightlight can be turned off
cons: Depending on room humidity, a puddle of water may collect around the base
Some owners find it awkward to invert the slippery water tank for refills

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: We just received this product yesterday and used it for the first time last night. We put it on the nightstand as the products states is okay to do and when we woke up in the morning everything around it was absolutely soaked. I even put a towel underneath it in case it leaked a little bit but the amount of water that was surrounding the humidifier was not what I expected. I was hopeful about this product due to all of the good reviews but be aware of this before you buy. Needless to say I will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is a failure
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Cool Mist Geniani Large 3L Water Tank humidifier in November. By January the machine died, plain and simple. We received a replacement from Amazon 9 days ago and it failed tonight. Died again, plain and simple. There is obviously something defective in the manufacture of this humidifier if two in a row die for no reason. Even the little blue night light died. Very disappointed. I am returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: History Buff

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier only lasts for 5 hours when on the lowest setting. This is in a small room. Much less time than advertised by the manufacturer. On top of that, it drenches any surface it is placed on. Clearly this is a flawed machine. This was purchased a couple months ago in preparation for my baby to arrive. When I first got it, I filled it, plugged it in and turned it on to make sure it worked, and because it did I set it aside thinking I was good to go. Now that I actually have to use it overnight, and it's not working as advertised, it's too late to return. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mcteenie

customer_reviews.title: Quit already
customer_reviews.text: I had started writing a very + review..... HOWEVER.... Received this humidifier 11/26/18. Followed all instructions exactly. Today is 12/20/18..... it already totally stopped functioning sometime during last night..... didn't last even a month..... really disgusting..... DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: KBNP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier because I have been waking up so dry in the morning. It made such a huge difference. I feel like I’m sleeping better. The cool mist feature is the best part. Great product. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to the reviews. Second day used it and it leaks.
customer_reviews.author: rfranek71

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for bedrooms
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a humidifier for kids. This one caught my eye cause the tank is big enough and it works with no filter. As it came, the description turned out to be pretty accurate. The water tank lasts for three days so I don't have to change it all that often. Also, the humidifier is pretty quiet so kids are not distracted from studying and sleeping. Cleaning is pretty easy since I don't have to remove and clean the filter. All I do is soak the base and the tank with vinegar for 7-10 minutes. I'm happy with the humidifier so I'm planning on buying another one for mine and my husband's bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Pena

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my husband has really bad seasonal allergies. In the summer the dryness from the air makes it hard for him to breathe + all of the pollen and dust (he works in construction). Having the humidifier helps him sleep at night and helps with loud snoring! Very easy to set up. I put it either on his nightstand or on the dresser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning and filling
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, however, it is placed on a tall dresser and is awkward to reach to take it into the bathroom to fill and return with the filled unit and place it in the correct place to function.. Cleaning is a problem, It is recommended that the unit be cleaned weekly............in a bathroom tub or kitchen sink. Because my unit is in my bedroom that means I have to cross the house to use the bathtub or the kitchen sink, using bleach (being careful not to bleach clothes etc.) So while I am pleased with the function of the humidifier I would not order it again and would not recommend itl
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE Does not last
customer_reviews.text: This was great at first however after or month the reservoir overflowed and could have caused electrocution. I had water everywhere. I am so disappointed and wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Roseysis

customer_reviews.title: Item only worked 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: worked until today and just quit! Wont turn on, beware poor item, Dont buy it.
customer_reviews.author: marie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but difficult to refill
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Love the looks. Difficult to refill. I use a humidifier all night all winter and this design looks great but it has to be held up with one hand while you pour in the water because it doesn't have a flat surface to stand on. Going to replace it with one that is easier to use and is less messy.
customer_reviews.author: Al Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stopped functioning after 6 - 8 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this product very well when it arrived and was working. Used in bedroom. Water lasted approximately 8 hours with setting low so refilled it daily. The problem was that the unit only worked for approximately six to eight weeks and then stopped functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Holds enough water to last several hours or overnight. Auto shut off feature is great so I don't have to worry about it continuing to run when the water is gone. Humidifiers a large room with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy A Leonard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous cheap humidifier and it was very bad. It would leak and after a few months stop working. This one shows to be a good quality, the company seems to be open to contact customers if there is any problem. No leaks. Easy. Works for hours. So far so good... I have been using it for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C.

customer_reviews.title: stopped working after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: it stopped working overnight after a couple months. doesn't do anything now. really disappointing! However, customer service was great and refunded me so that is why I changed my rating up to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: N C

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product!
customer_reviews.text: All in all, I couldn’t be happier with my purchase. Had a great night sleep and woke up able to breathe without being congested due to a dry room. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just excellent
customer_reviews.text: For three months, this humidifier has been working almost non-stop. I've loved the experience: shut-down is super-convenient since I always forget to turn things off myself. Also, just a little detail, but it looks super hi-tech. I'm loving the vit creates at my office. The nightlight for evenings is pretty cool thought I almost never use it. I like the choice and find the humidifier to be hands down excellent. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Mae Allison

customer_reviews.title: Good but with flaws
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for the benefits that it provides. The manufacturer said it had a 24 hour or 3 night lasting timer but mine lasts only 6 to 9 hours depending on the humidifier level selected. Also, the no filter is good but the humidifier does require cleaning almost once every week if you are using it every day. Be careful when carrying because it’s easy to spill the water from the base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sleek humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier. It is efficient and very sleek. In the past the humidifiers that i have had ae very bulky and loud. The price is also amazing. Living in AZ we run our humidifier continually and this is up to the challenge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It's a humidifier. I think I would have been just as satisfied with a sunbeam and that's cheaper?
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: only worked for a week
customer_reviews.text: The product only worked f or a week. I used it daily, then it just stopped working. I'm not happy, the product is too large to return
customer_reviews.author: c west

customer_reviews.title: Positive Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed on how well this product was packaged...instructions were easy to follow...love the look..We have only used it a few nights in our bedroom, but already feel a difference in air quality....definitely a positive purchase!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ferrar

customer_reviews.title: Love my humidifier
customer_reviews.text: It could hold a bit more water, but if i fill it up it will run almost to full blast for 12-24 hours. Wish there was a way to fill it up from the top instead of having to flip it over on the bottom, but I thoroughly enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. Only thing they need to add some type of way to hold the bottom and the top together while you carry it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes everything around it SOAKED by morning.
customer_reviews.text: The mist does not humidify the air. I ran it overnight for the first time, and all it did was soak our carpet and the table it was sitting on had standing water on it the next morning, ruining the table. We won’t be able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Maj

customer_reviews.title: Love this humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little machine. Easy to fill, easy to use, puts out a huge amount of steam. So far just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jasper

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn't turn on after only a few months use.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Useful device that works well
customer_reviews.text: I like this humidifier because it works well and is very useful during winter months. It’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This works great easy to clean. I just wish it stored more water. Fits perfectly in the sink when trying to refill. Will more than likely order a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after the ENT recommended a humidifier to help with “clogged ears” and congestion. It has helped.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Duplantis

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design
customer_reviews.text: What is up with this product? Water comes out from both ends. Poorly designed and seeking a refund.
customer_reviews.author: S.S leena

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you sleep with the AC on
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is sleeping better at night since I bought it, worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Morf

customer_reviews.title: Cute humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Small size easy to use but you have to put infront of the heater to blow the mist up if not the mist will fall down wet all the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Didee

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a lot of mist which is nice! I also like the night light feature. Plan to use this in my daughters room when she is old enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Robinson

customer_reviews.title: I can breathe again!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference this cool must humidifier has made to my health. It's quiet and easy to use. Best investment I made.
customer_reviews.author: Jovie

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had for 2 months. Just stopped working and the return window was only 30 days! Super disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few weeks, but so far this is a great humidifier. Quite, easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love the humidifier although I wish it was bigger. The reviews said it was good for large areas but it doesn't seem to be enough for my bedroom. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product cracked within a week, leaked the first day had to toss and get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dreid

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, seems to work well, very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Jacksonville, FL

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Like that Air flow nozzle on top swivels around to. Different positions. Hard to hold tank while filling.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Vanderhoff

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s quiet and safe for my five-year-old. Plus it’s easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and easy to use. I would deff recommend
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya

customer_reviews.title: How useful I’m hoping this will be
customer_reviews.text: Hoping this will help during the winter months to not have it so dry in apt for me and my guinea pig
customer_reviews.author: Christine Slifka

customer_reviews.title: Humidifier is just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I love this humidifier. It's quiet and provides a soft mist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and the directions are very clear. It’s not flimsy or crappy made.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: IT LEAKS FROM THE BOTTOM!
customer_reviews.text: LEAKS OUT THE BOTTOM! I was pretty excited about this little humidifier but after the first 3 uses water started leaking out the bottom onto my wood dresser.... Then I put it on my bathroom counter for a couple of more uses and the leak through the vent in the bottom just got worse and rust started leaking out as well. Horrible design considering this is even possible.... The picture was taken after the counter was wiped dry.
customer_reviews.author: Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a humidifier, that means I have nothing to compare it to. It worked exactly how I hoped it would. Was very easy to fill and as soon as I put it in the base and plugged it in then the cool mist instantly starting coming out. we have been using the humidifier for less then a week now, it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Gives a lot of mist
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a about a week or so. The only thing I notice is that it leaves the bottom filled with water so I have to dump that out as well and dry it. Other than that I have to refill the tank up every other day even though I keep it at the lowest it allows me to. I bought this specific one because of how big it is and thought I didn't have to refill it often. I do like I can turn the light off. So 2 stars off, one for having water on bottom and one on how much I refill it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Even on lowest setting puts out soaking mist
customer_reviews.text: Even on the lowest setting in a large room the amount of mist it puts out leaves everything wet. Placed unit on table and a towel both under and on floor below. Both towels were soaked. Had to run fan to dry area. One month past time to be able to return. Now need to shop for something else.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA GIANNINI

customer_reviews.title: excellent misting
customer_reviews.text: I'm using it almost every night. On high output I run out of water by morning. I've ran it dry a number of times and it doesn't cause any issues or ruin in. It is 100% superior to a regular mist with the heavy drops. My preference is a warm mist because it holds more water in the vapor but the ultrasonic does a superior job to even the warm mist.
customer_reviews.author: Kpadd1962

customer_reviews.title: Liner broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: The liner that keeps the water in the tank broke after 23 uses! I feel I wasted my money! Now I put in the water and it leaks all over my floors causing me more work! When it works it is great! Love it when it works!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect use
customer_reviews.text: Perfect use for adults and children! Easy to use. I love the shape of it, very gentle and fits every place in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ofri Harel

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for light sleepers.. bubbling/knocking sounds randomly!
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, my only complaint... Randomly when the water is settling or moving or I don't know... It makes a knocking sound. If you use this when sleeping... Scares the living daylights out of me!!! Again, the product works.. Still adjusting humidity level because it's really too damp when I get up... But the knocking noise is very startling (knocking/bubbling sound..).
customer_reviews.author: KEG9181

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of set up. I liked the way it worked. Its whisper quiet. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J.D. ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: We go through humidifiers like tissues.
customer_reviews.text: I hate that the very lowest setting spews so much mist that it wets the carpet and runs out before morning. We live in dry Colorado and run a humidifier in kids bedrooms nightly. I guess we got what we paid for. Can’t wait for this thing to break so I can replace it with the $80 one we have from bed bath and beyond in my other daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Inner Vent Area Impossible to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for us for a while, but then we started getting build up in the inner column that the steam comes through. The bottom is easy to soak in vinegar, but the column is impossible to get to with a cloth. We stopped using it after a couple months because of the build-up.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen MN

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product MAKES LOUD NOISE AND ONLY RUNS ABOUT 6 HOURS😡
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take care of
customer_reviews.text: Takes an average 10 minutes to fill in the humidifier and 20-25 minutes to do the cleaning. It has only a few basic elements so, honestly, I don’t even feel a huge need for manuals. I hoped for it to run for 2 nights in a row, it’s only 24-30 hours so far so you’d still have to change the water in the tank every day. Having said that, a humidifier is overall great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Thus far I really love this humidifier. Also nice that it has the warranty on it if anything goes wrong. I find that it really fills a room quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Lea Buel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very quiet humidifier. Easy to fill, easy to use, does exactly what I need from a humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa J. Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Last night was my first night using the GENIANI and it was wonderful! It helped with the dryness I had been dealing with!! I am so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t last long and all the mist are on the carpet/floor
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: So bad
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of every 3 times I use it the product overflows and leaks everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: John Moss

customer_reviews.title: Nice...
customer_reviews.text: The first one leaked all over our carpet but I contacted the seller and he gave me a full refund. The second one is working great. Its for a small room and needs to refill every night.
customer_reviews.author: KD
